title: What is the opinion about the HP 14 AM119TX? Should I buy? - Quora

response.answer_text: This Notebook is not only stylish but also advanced in its functionality. It features a touchpad with multi-gesture supports and a full-size island-style keyboard that makes it user-friendly. This lightweight notebook comes with a 14 inches diagonal HD SVA BrightView WLED-backlit display that has a resolution of 1366x768 pixels. HP 14 AM119TX is powered by a 41 Wh 4-cell Li-ion battery that delivers an uninterrupted performance for long hours as well. A 65 W EM AC power adapter helps to recharge the notebook whenever needed. It is equipped with a 1 TB 5400 rpm SATA HDD that offers ample space for both your personal and professional data. You can expand the memory with a multi-format SD media card reader. With the AMD Radeon R5 M430 Graphics (2 GB DDR3 dedicated) processor, you can improve your experience while playing advanced games. Moreover, the notebook comes with dual speakers powered by the DTS Studio Sound technology that delivers an exceptional sound quality at the same time. The HP TrueVision HD web camera includes integrated digital microphone that facilitates video calling.
